U

ui - package ui
 
uiCreateCinemaShowtime() - Method in class AdminUi
Creates cinema showtime based on user input
uiCreateMovie() - Method in class AdminUi
Creates a new movie from user input and passes it into the AdminController class to add to file
uiRemoveCinemaShowtimes() - Method in class AdminUi
Removes cinema showtime based on user input
uiRemoveMovie() - Method in class AdminUi
Gets title from user input and removes movie based on title
uiUpdateCinemaShowtimes() - Method in class AdminUi
Function to update cinema showtimes (incomplete)
uiUpdateMovie() - Method in class AdminUi
Get title of movie from user input and chekcs if movie exists If movie exists, passes it into a movie object and asks user what features they would like to edit If movie does not exist, return
updateCasts(Movie) - Method in class AdminUi
Separated from uiUpdateMovie() to update casts
updateCinemaShowtime(int, int) - Method in class AdminController
Updates cinema showtime with indicated movieId and cinemaId, incomplete
updateMovie(Movie, String) - Method in class AdminController
Updates movie in movies.txt indicated by oldTitle parameter and movie object from AdminUi class
updateOverallRating() - Method in class Movie
Updates the overall rating of the movie.
updateSystemSettings() - Method in class AdminController
function to update system settings, incomplete
